â€‹Mo is the Director of Partner Strategy. Mo helps partner groups realize their outreach and engagement goals by incorporating data and technology. Prior to joining the Bluelabs team, Mo was a data and analytics director at several progressive groups, including the Obama 2008 campaign. When he is not at work, you can find Mo helping out at 3rd Pillar, a charity he co-founded, which is dedicated to helping families in Northeast DC mitigate the cost of food, healthcare and education.
